items.title: WATCH:  World's 1st gene-edited baby takes 1st steps
items.description: KJ Muldoon received the first-of-its-kind gene therapy for a potentially fatal disease and is now marking major developmental milestones.

items.title: Inflation report to be released Thursday expected to show slight uptick in November
items.description: The inflation rate stands a percentage point higher than the Fed's target of 2%.
